We're looking for software engineers looking to work with Elasticsearch, PostgreSQL, Java/Javascript. We build a cloud security product for financial institutions. Keeping them and their customers safe is our business. We're looking for engineers of all skill levels: junior, mid-level and senior engineers.

See this Angellist post for more details: https://angel.co/praesidio-1/jobs/90332-software-engineer
